name: Heaven 'n Hell
description:
As a submission to GGJ '22, with the theme of duality, you will see that this game changes between the two realms of Heaven and Hell. Heaven 'n Hell is a high speed 2d platformer where you control the map and obstacles by instantaneously travelling between two parallel realms. 

Find respite in Heaven, slay your blockades and unlock your path from Hell, and hunt down the final Arch-Angel. Enjoy your journey through Heaven n' Hell!
